summary:
## Blue Ridge Mountains

The Blue Ridge Mountains are a beautiful mountain range in the eastern United States. They stretch for 550 miles across seven states.  They get their name from the blueish haze caused by trees releasing a substance called isoprene.  The Blue Ridge is home to two national parks (Shenandoah and Great Smoky Mountains), the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, and eight national forests.
title: Blue Ridge Mountains
